name: Ragnarok Online
body:
## Installation

### Installation 1 - Using our Patcher(Recommended)
* Download the latest kRO client. This is the main Ragnarok Online file and you can download it [here](https://www.nickyzai.com/?p=kro)
* After download, just click the installer **Full_kRO_Renewal_20150601_.exe** then install it.
* Next is download the patcher [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/5do5t93i90plnr9/patcher.zip?dl=0) then extract the files to the main **RO** folder.
* Next is right click **patcher.exe** run as administrator, then it will start downloading files from the server. 
* After you finish downloading click **START GAME**. At first run it will give you a warning, just click cancel to proceed.
* That's it. Read the FAQ for more info.

### Installation 2 - Manual
* Download the latest kRO client. This is the main Ragnarok Online file and you can download it [here](https://www.nickyzai.com/?p=kro)
* Next is to download our client. These are files that we need inorder to connect to the server. [link here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9CN6U7o6wroQ1RZVURwX1lMTDA/view?usp=sharing), [another link](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zrx07g2p7ddl5gs/client.7z?dl=0)
* After download, just click the installer **Full_kRO_Renewal_20150601_.exe** then install it.
* Extract **client.7z** then copy the files inside it to the main **RO** folder except for the **System** folder.
* Then copy the files inside the **System** folder to the main **RO**/**System** folder.
* Now click **2013-08-07aRagexe_patched.exe** to run the game but first you must register a new account. Read the FAQ for more info.

## FAQ

How to register?
- Visit our control panel [here](http://128.199.135.168/). This is where you manage your account and whatnot.

How to update the client?
- Run **rsu-kro-rag-lite.exe** and **rsu-kro-renewal-lite.exe** inside the main RO folder. Just don't click start after the update.

How to change resolution, disable sound, etc.?
- Just run **opensetup.exe**.

Can I use multiple clients/windows?
- Yes

What RO emulator are you using?
- I'm using [rAthena](https://github.com/rathena/rathena) instead of [Hercules](https://github.com/HerculesWS/Hercules). Here is a good [discussion](http://herc.ws/board/topic/2248-hercules-vs-rathena/) on which is a better emulator.

Is this pre renewal or renewal?
- [Renewal](http://irowiki.org/wiki/Renewal)

What are the exp and drop rates?
- You can type `@rates` ingame to see the rates.

What are other commands that I can use ingame?
- You can use commands like `@save` `@go` `@autoloot` `@storage` `@rates` `@check` `@identify`.

What vps are you using or where did you host the emulator?
- At digitalocean, here is a [screenshot](https://u.teknik.io/heH7Dx.png).

Wow, your FAQ suck!
- Just make a pull request then change things that you don't want to see.

###That's it, glhf!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
